daily_plan_req: Maria Lopez spends all day playing hide and seek by hiding.
name: Maria Lopez
innate: energetic, enthusiastic, inquisitive, friendly, empathy, humility, sensitivity
learned: Maria Lopez is one of the players that is hiding with the other seven players in the hide-and-seek game in Smallville. She loves to play with other people and explore new ideas of where to hide.
currently: Maria Lopez is hiding from Klaus Mueller and Wolfgang Schultz. She moves around Smallville hiding spot to hiding spot and hiding there everyday.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez plays hide and seek all day. She likes to hide alone and/or with others if they are not caught by the seeker, Klaus Mueller or Wolfgang Schultz.
living_area: the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:Maria Lopez's room
